```{r}
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = wt, y = mpg)) +
  geom_point(color = "steelblue", size = 3) +
  labs(
    title = "Fuel Efficiency vs. Car Weight",
    x = "Weight (1000 lbs)",
    y = "Miles per Gallon (mpg)"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()
```
